# HMError.Code.cannotUnblockNonBridgeAccessory

**Case**

An error indicating a non-bridge accessory cannot be unblocked.

## Declaration

```swift
case cannotUnblockNonBridgeAccessory
```

## Bridge errors

- **HMError.Code.bridgedAccessoryNotReachable**: An error indicating the bridged accessory cannot be reached.
- **HMError.Code.cannotRemoveNonBridgeAccessory**: An attempt to remove a bridged accessory.

items.description: An error indicating the bridged accessory cannot be reached.
